author: CT Phipps
description:
Cthulhu: Grimoire by Eric Malikyte is a work that I was initially hesitant to read because I have a very high bar for writing using H.P. Lovecraft’s creations. Too many fans lose a lot of the nuance and simply substitute various horrifying tentacle monsters without knowing why they were scary. They also neglect to do […]

The post REVIEW: Cthulhu: Grimoire by Eric Malikyte appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Cthulhu: Grimoire by Eric Malikyte
